MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Text.Json.JsonElement Clone() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a JsonElement that can be safely stored beyond the lifetime of the original .
Docs.returns: A JsonElement that can be safely stored beyond the lifetime of the original .

remarks.format: If this JsonElement is itself the output of a previous call to `Clone` or a value contained within another JsonElement which was the output of a previous call to `Clone`, this method results in no additional memory allocation.

Public Function GetProperty (utf8PropertyName As ReadOnlySpan(Of Byte)) As JsonElement

Docs.param: The UTF-8 representation (with no Byte-Order-Mark (BOM)) of the name of the property to return.
Docs.summary: Gets a representing the value of a required property identified by .
Docs.returns: A representing the value of the requested property.

remarks.format:
Property name matching is performed as an ordinal, case-sensitive comparison.
If a property is defined multiple times for the same object, the method matches the last such definition.

Docs.exception: No property was found with the requested name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

Docs.summary: Gets a string representation for the current value appropriate to the value type.
Docs.returns: A string representation for the current value appropriate to the value type.

remarks.format:
For <xref:System.Text.Json.JsonValueType.Null?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType> is returned.
For <xref:System.Text.Json.JsonValueType.True?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Boolean.TrueString?displayProperty=nameWithType> is returned.
For <xref:System.Text.Json.JsonValueType.False?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Boolean.FalseString?displayProperty=nameWithType> is returned.
For <xref:System.Text.Json.JsonValueType.String?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the value of <xref:System.Text.Json.JsonElement.GetString> is returned.
For other types, the value of <xref:System.Text.Json.JsonElement.GetRawText> is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool TryGetDateTime([out] valuetype System.DateTime& value) cil managed
Public Function TryGetDateTime (ByRef value As DateTime) As Boolean

Docs.param: When this method returns, contains the date and time value equivalent to the current JSON string.
Docs.summary: Attempts to represent the current JSON string as a .
Docs.returns: if the string can be represented as a , otherwise.

remarks.format: This method does not create a DateTime representation of values other than JSON strings.

Public Function TryGetDecimal (ByRef value As Decimal) As Boolean

Docs.param: When this method returns, contains the decimal equivalent of the current JSON number.
Docs.summary: Attempts to represent the current JSON number as a .
Docs.returns: if the number can be represented as a , otherwise.

remarks.format: This method does not parse the contents of a JSON string value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool TryGetDouble([out] float64& value) cil managed
Public Function TryGetDouble (ByRef value As Double) As Boolean

Docs.param: When this method returns, contains a double-precision floating point value equivalent to the current JSON number.
Docs.summary: Attempts to represent the current JSON number as a .
Docs.returns: if the number can be represented as a , otherwise.

remarks.format:
This method does not parse the contents of a JSON string value.
On .NET Core, this method does not return `false` for values larger than <xref:System.Double.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> or smaller than <xref:System.Double.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>. Instead, it returns <see langword="true> and assigns <xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Double.NegativeInfinity?displayProperty=nameWithType> to `value`.

remarks.format: This method does not create a Guid representation of values other than JSON strings.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool TryGetProperty (ReadOnlySpan<byte> utf8PropertyName, out System.Text.Json.JsonElement value);
.method public hidebysig instance bool TryGetProperty(valuetype System.ReadOnlySpan`1<unsigned int8> utf8PropertyName, [out] valuetype System.Text.Json.JsonElement& value) cil managed
Public Function TryGetProperty (utf8PropertyName As ReadOnlySpan(Of Byte), ByRef value As JsonElement) As Boolean
public: bool TryGetProperty(ReadOnlySpan<System::Byte> utf8PropertyName, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Text::Json::JsonElement % value);

Docs.param: The UTF-8 (with no Byte-Order-Mark (BOM)) representation of the name of the property to return.
Receives the value of the located property.
Docs.summary: Looks for a property named in the current object, returning a value that indicates whether or not such a property exists. When the property exists, the method assigns its value to the argument.
Docs.returns: if the property was found, otherwise.

remarks.format:
Property name matching is performed as an ordinal, case-sensitive comparison.
If a property is defined multiple times for the same object, the method matches the last such definition.

Docs.param: The name of the property to find.
When this method returns, contains the value of the specified property.
Docs.summary: Looks for a property named in the current object, returning a value that indicates whether or not such a property exists. When the property exists, the method assigns its value to the argument.
Docs.returns: if the property was found, otherwise.

remarks.format:
Property name matching is performed as an ordinal, case-sensitive comparison.

When this method returns, contains the value of the specified property.
Docs.summary: Looks for a property named in the current object, returning a value that indicates whether or not such a property exists. When the property exists, its value is assigned to the argument.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool TryGetSingle([out] float32& value) cil managed
Public Function TryGetSingle (ByRef value As Single) As Boolean

Docs.param: When this method returns, contains the single-precision floating point value equivalent to the current JSON number.
Docs.summary: Attempts to represent the current JSON number as a .
Docs.returns: if the number can be represented as a , otherwise.

remarks.format:
This method does not parse the contents of a JSON string value.
On .NET Core, this method does not return `false` for values larger than <xref:System.Single.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> or smaller than <xref:System.Single.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>). Instead, it returns `false` and assigns <xref:System.Single.PositiveInfinity?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Single.NegativeInfinity?displayProperty=nameWithType> to the `value` argument.
